Great fun, especially with friends. Only downside is the waiting time on matchmaking. There's a bit of a learning curve to begin with but once you know what you're doing and learn the perks of both you and the killers you're good
Really fun with friends. Really boring alone.
nice

Just got over 1k hours in the game and still play it on and off. It's like anything else competitive you'll have good games, bad games, lag games, horrible matchmaking, long wait times in lobbies with dedicated servers to play killer and balance issues. However if you can look past those happening now and then at it's core it's still a fun game once you get a feel for it and it's better played with friends than trying the solo adventure.

2/10/21

I can no longer in good will recommend this game in it's current state of patch 4.5.0 I actually don't mind the new UI or the animations that much though they are a bit 'clunky' and the camera drop with the character feels odd or annoying to me. The big issues with the game is the ranking system is garbage and has been for over a year, the survivor wait time in groups is super long due to what I imagine is a lack of people willing to play killer. (Killer wait times are very short so to me that means it must be an imbalance with no incentive to play killer and deal with most games being a SWF) 

No one I know asked or wanted a UI or animation update but I get it things need to change over time to make the game better but I feel like this is not what they wanted. More so that it seems like killers can now lunge and hit people from super far away and while lag and other issues I've never found myself saying "wow that hit?" as much as I do right now. 

Overall I'd avoid this game for now it's well know the devs of the game do not listen to player feedback.

5/20/2021

Game has had a number of updates and fixes to a lot of issues however on a high skill level play it's still unbalanced.. Given I don't think there would ever be a way to balance it to a way that would make everyone happy for the upper hour/tier players such as myself. That being said I will not change my review to recommend the game to newer players there are just too many things to learn in this game to be considered 'good' at it. The game has come a long way from it's release in 2016 some good, lots of bad and some 'wtf why do that?' but in the end it's still fun to play with friends but don't bother if you're going to play it solo.

Adictivo, se que hay màs juegos parecidos a este pero termina siendo unico en su genero por el tipo de jugabilidad. Perks y Builds distintas para cada asesino o survivor.

---

Despues de 500+ hrs, sigue siendo el rey de este genero. Se viene el crossover con Resident Evil en 1 mes más..

---

Crossover con Resident Evil muy positivo .. El juego sigue siendo entretenido y con muchas builds y cosas que probar..

---

This game can be pretty well balanced; one powerful killer to four average survivors can work pretty well.  The killer has abilities, speed, and the Entity on their side, but survivors have the numbers, which, when working together, can work nicely.  Some maps slightly favor one side or the other, but not so much that it would affect the game terribly.  The company, Behaviour, is pretty responsive and open to fixing things, such as broken and/or unfair perks/abilities/map issues, which is pretty cool if the community universally agrees that something is unbalanced.
With all that you can do between matches and what you can get from the Blood Web, no two trials are alike; it's really good at keeping the game fresh.

Excelente juego, las mecanicas son basicas pero es dificil dominarlas por completo. resulta bastante interesante ser tanto asesino como superviviente, aunque por lo general hay muchos asesinos entonces la espera es mas larga. hay ciertos asesinos pagos que son muy dificiles de vencer pero se puede llegar a sobrevivir con trabajo en equipo. recomendada la compra, para disfrutarlo no es necesario comprar los dlc porque uno puede interactuar con otros jugadores que tengan asesinos o personajes adicionales.
любимая помойка <3

[i] [h1] 猫捉老鼠——黎明杀机[spoiler] (捉迷藏血腥版) [/spoiler]。[/h1]  [/i]

[h1] 一些给新人的话 [/h1]

黎明杀机对萌新玩家特别非常十分不友好，建议心理承受能力不佳的萌新玩家不要急着开喷游戏体验极差，因为它从设计上来说，采用了非对称对抗的形式就注定了这个游戏是不平衡的。比起生死输赢，更重要的是[u] [b] 在这不平衡的对抗中获取最大化的收益 [/b] [/u]，无论是对自己来说还是对团队来说。死亡不是结束，而是获取血点和熟悉这个游戏的开始。

所以，在游玩之前，首先放下急于获胜，或者说活下来的想法，多考虑如何能够为队伍争取时间、转移屠夫注意力等形式为团队做贡献，需要注意的是这类互相帮助的行为也能很快地获取血点(分数)。

初次接触这个游戏的话，要做的最重要的事情首先是熟悉地图，首先从外围对整个地图做个大致的了解。然后去寻找最近的发电机(顶端有四个昏暗的一闪一闪的灯)，尽快修复。

然后是熟悉分辨各种屠夫的方法。黎明杀鸡中最重要、最有效的判断屠夫远近、判断屠夫种类的方式就是听声音音效，大部分屠夫在靠近的时候会有越靠近而频率越高的心跳声，不同种类的屠夫也有其特有的音效。比如，"小叮当"幽灵屠夫在进入隐身和退出隐身的时候会有当当当的钟声，"兔妈"嘴边会哼歌等等。可以多玩一玩熟悉各类屠夫的音效。

接着是操作方面。尽量不要用跑的方式来移动或者是翻墙、进柜，这样跑着移动会在地面上留下只有屠夫可以看到的红色轨迹，跑得再快屠夫顺着轨迹还是能找上你。其次，跑着翻越窗台、出入铁柜会发出很大的声响，同时屠夫会收到这种巨大噪声的提示，也可以很快赶到附近。所以平常只要不是屠夫在你身边，或者确定屠夫在追其它人的时候，尽量用走，不要跑，少移动，多隐藏。哪有躲猫猫到处乱窜的呀，这不明摆着想被抓么。

由于这是评测不是攻略，其它的就不多说，多加练习和熟悉就可以了。有什么问题也可以参考百度上面一搜一大堆的杀鸡攻略，也可以直接加好友问我(虽然也是一个菜鸡XD)

[h1] 评测 [/h1]

游戏刚出来的时候，我是拒绝购买的。虽然当时对这类看起来挺新奇的非对称对抗的游戏挺感兴趣的，不过BUG、掉线等等一列问题让我加了愿望单后一直在观望。还好，在后续的修复中，这些问题也逐渐在改善。入手后刚开始玩的时候，代入感很强，屠夫靠近时已经分不清是游戏中的心跳音效还是自己的心跳声。在遇到经典的板墙组合时，和屠夫来一发爱的魔力转圈圈，场面一度十分欢乐。从当年那只有寥寥几个的屠夫和人类，到现在这么多地图和职业技能，当年那个小小的制作组能够坚持到现在还在更新，也是挺不容易的。

评分：7.5/10
